name: SuggestaRandomPSPlusPremiumGame
0:
”Alexa, open random plus premium”
”Alexa, start random plus premium”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random plus premium
des:
Overwhelmed by the huge Playstation Plus Premium lineup and don't know what to play next? Let Alexa choose a random game for you to play next from the current Playstation Plus Premium (and Extra) lineup in your region.

Choose whether you want a game suggestion from all available games or just PS5, PS4, PS3, PS2, PS1, or PSP when Alexa asks you. Then she will suggest a game at random for you to play next including which console it is for (PS5, PS4, PS3, PS2, PS1, or PSP).

Updated monthly to add new games added to the service and to remove games removed from the service.

Note: This is an unofficial skill and is in no way affiliated with Playstation services.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
